title: Interpretation of a dream about feces for single and married women, according to Ibn Sirin 2021

preview.html: Many people see in their dreams a dream of feces, which is one of the dreams that arouse suspicion and disgust to the dreamer. This is a different precise site in this article to clarify the interpretation of a dream about feces for unmarried women, with a review of all the good and evil interpretations of this dream. Interpretation of a dream about feces for a single womanIf an unmarried girl sees feces in her dream, this indicates that she is surrounded by a large group of bad friends. Therefore, she must be careful and stay away from people who try to corrupt her morals. If an unmarried girl sees that she is contaminated with feces in a dream. This dream shows that those close to her were jealous of her. Imam Nabulsi said that the interpretation of a dream about feces for a single or married woman indicates the emergence of a large number of problems in the life of the dreamer. He will face a difficult time as a result of these problems. Imam Ibn Sirin confirmed that seeing feces in an unmarried girl’s dream indicates obstacles that fall on the visionary and thus she cannot achieve her goals. If an unmarried girl sees herself getting rid of feces in her dream. This is one of the good visions that indicate that the fortuneteller has a good reputation among the people because of his purity and chastity. If an unmarried girl throws her excrement in front of people, this is not a good vision, as it indicates that the woman will be exposed to a major scandal as a result of her wrong actions that violate the law. When an unmarried girl throws feces The chair is in the toilet, the vision indicates that the dreamer will separate from the person he loves. But she should not be upset because she does not deserve him in the first place, and separation from him is a great spoil for her. Interpretation of a dream about feces for a married woman. If a married woman sees herself cleansed of feces, Imam Muhammad ibn Sirin’s interpretation of this dream indicates that the dreamer will hear some good news in the future. Nearby. When a married woman sees feces on the bed where she and her husband sleep, and that feces is black. This dream expresses the occurrence of many disagreements between her and her husband, and these disagreements may end in divorce and estrangement between them. If a married woman sees her husband’s excrement and this husband is absent from him due to his travel or death, then this dream indicates the intensity of the dreamer’s longing for her husband. If a married woman touches feces And she got dirty with it, the meaning of this dream is that she does not stop spreading rumors and delving into people’s symptoms in a way that distorts their reputation and harms their feelings. The interpretation of a dream about feces for an unmarried woman and a married woman according to Imam Al-Sadiq is very similar, as it shows that the dreamer has committed many sins, and therefore he must hurry. To God Almighty before it is too late. Getting rid of feces in a married woman’s dream and purifying the body of it indicates the end of all her worries. It also indicates the overcoming of all enemies in the event that the dreamer has a disagreement with some relatives, neighbors, or colleagues. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about menstruation in a dream by leading interpreters. Interpretation of a dream about feces on the ground. Senior commentators said about the interpretation of a dream about feces for a single woman and a married woman, if this feces is On Earth, the visions

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about fear of falling from a high place in Ibn Sirin’s dream?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about fear of falling from a high place: There is no doubt that falling from a high place can actually cause a person to die or be seriously injured, especially if he hits solid ground or the place is very high, such as a mountain or tower, or he falls from a car. What is the interpretation of a dream about fear of falling from above? Do they indicate associations that may be unwanted, or are they just dreams and expressions of obsessions, fears, and negative thoughts that control the subconscious? Interpretation of a dream about fear of falling from a high place Next, we will learn about the most important interpretations of one of the strangest dreams that a sleeper can see, which is Dreaming of fear of falling from above: Seeing the dreamer’s fear of falling from a height in a dream indicates the anxiety and tension that controls him. Whoever sees in his dream that he is afraid of falling from a height, will move to a new life that does not suit him. The dream interpretation of fear of falling from above reflects difficulties And the obstacles that the dreamer faces and disturb the tranquility of his life. Interpretation of the dream of fear of falling from a high position by Ibn Sirin, according to Ibn Sirin regarding the vision of fear of falling from above in a dream as follows: Ibn Sirin interprets seeing the dreamer’s fear of falling from a height in the dream as evidence of his determination to succeed and not Despair despite the obstacles and difficulties he faces. If the dreamer is wealthy and rich and sees in his dream that he is afraid of falling from above, then he is afraid of losing his money and losing his influence. The intense fear of falling from above in the dream symbolizes the dreamer’s fear of facing something in reality and always running away from what It is reflected in his vision, and they are nothing but dreams. Interpretation of a single person’s dream of fear of falling from a height. Most jurists unanimously agree on the interpretation of a dream of fear of falling from a height for single people, which is that the cause or interpretation is due to psychological reasons and fears, as we will see as follows: Interpretation of a dream of fear of falling from a height Height for single people indicates the pressures and psychological disorders that she suffers from, perhaps due to delayed marriage. If the dreamer gets engaged and sees in her dream that she is standing on a high place and is afraid of falling, this is an indication that there are many problems and disagreements in her romantic relationship and she must think again before marriage. As for the dreamer The one who is studying sees herself afraid of falling from a height. She is afraid of approaching exams, and she must put these concerns out of her mind and focus on studying. Watching an unmarried woman may reflect that she is afraid of falling from a height, and fear of deception and betrayal due to the emotional trauma she experienced in the past. Interpretation of the dream of heights and the fear of falling among single people. Jurists differed in the interpretation of the dream of heights and the fear of falling among single people. Some of them see it as a good thing while others believe the opposite, as we will see as follows: The interpretation of the dream of heights and the fear of falling indicates the fulfillment of ambitions and aspirations and a life full of stability. As Ibn Sirin says. While some scholars believe that seeing a girl in her dream who is afraid of falling from a height could foretell the presence of deceivers in her life, betrayal by those close to her, and failure in her romantic relationships. Interpretation of a woman’s dream

title: Interpretation of a dream about climbing an electricity pole in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about climbing an electric pole in a dream When searching for an interpretation of a dream about climbing an electric pole in a dream, it is one of the dreams that some people see, but there are a number of interpretations that clarify the site, citing interpretations of some working scholars who are trying to reach the truth. Interpretation of a dream about climbing an electric pole In a dream: In the event that one sees himself climbing a power pole, this may indicate the abundance of goodness that the dreamer receives during this time. The appearance of an electric pole in the dream may indicate the vast sustenance that the dreamer will gain in his life during those days. If one sees himself climbing an electric pole This may indicate the power of personal insight and self-reliance. Seeing climbing an electricity pole may indicate happy events that are happening to the dreamer at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of climbing a high place in a dream: Anyone who sees in a dream that he was able to climb to a high place Very high, it can be a sign of the fulfillment of desires and dreams. Dreaming of climbing a high place in a dream may be a sign of the effort and effort that the dreamer is making to achieve his ambitions. In the event that one sees himself climbing high in a dream, this may indicate that he will get what he wants During this period. Seeing a person that he has climbed to a high place may indicate the abundance of goodness and enormous livelihood that the dreamer will obtain during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of climbing the stairs of the mosque in a dream: Climbing the stairs of the mosque in a dream may indicate some of the difficulties that the dreamer faces. In his life during those days. Whoever dreams that he is climbing the stairs may indicate that there are some obstacles in his life that stand in the way of his dreams. Seeing yourself climbing the stairs of the mosque in a dream may indicate that you are moving away from God, Blessed and Most High, and you need to repent and return to God. Blessed and Most High. A dream of climbing a mosque tower in a dream may be a sign of bad changes occurring in his life during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of climbing an elevator in a dream If someone sees himself climbing an elevator, this may indicate good changes occurring in his life during this period. Time. A person dreaming that he was climbing an elevator may indicate the ease and comfort he is enjoying at that time. Seeing climbing an escalator in a dream may indicate that goals and ambitions will be achieved easily during this period. Seeing an elevator climbing in a dream may indicate happy events You will come to Him during this time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream of climbing the stairs in a dream. Climbing the stairs in a dream may mean achieving goals and ambitions during this time, and God knows best. A dream of climbing an airplane ladder in a dream may indicate closeness to God Almighty, and avoiding sins and disobedience. In the event that If someone saw that he was climbing the stairs of an airplane, this may indicate positive changes occurring in his life during those days. Dreaming of climbing the stairs in a dream can indicate joyful changes and controlling difficult life circumstances, thanks to God. Interpretation of a dream of climbing the stairs with difficulty in a dream: Climbing the stairs

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing seedlings in a dream by Ibn Sirin and Imam al-Sadiq

preview.html: Spraying crops in a dream is evidence of the approach of marriage for unmarried and unmarried women, and perhaps the married woman gets pregnant and waters the plants. Money and life are permissible, and Imam Ibn Sirin also believes that spraying seeds with water is good and sustainable, and with pesticides is evidence of many fears that the dreamer is trying to get rid of soon and in this article you have everything related to seeing yourself sprayed. Seeds on a man and a woman dreaming in detail. Sprinkling plants in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Imam Ibn Sirin believes that watering a seed in a single man’s dream is good news for a close marriage, and this vision can win a prestigious position and a new job, God willing. There are some places where we see that sprinkling Water on plants is a good omen, and in a pregnant woman’s dream, it is evidence of the approaching condition and the safety of the fetus. A green plant in a dream represents money and permissible livelihood, and it can represent good offspring for females and males alike. Sprinkling water on the soil in a dream is a lie, deception, and bad characteristics of the pioneer. The vision can express a warning and warning to return to the path of truth. A married woman can see herself watering the orchards in a dream, and this vision portends an imminent pregnancy and abundant happiness with the husband. Interpretation of a dream about spraying green plants: Seeing him watering or spraying a farm is a reflection of the dreamer’s condition and the situation that he is in. On it in reality, whether at work or in the family sphere, and it also indicates a trip to it soon. Seeing a married man watering this green plant means that he must teach his children the Holy Qur’an and bring them closer to God. As for seeing a single man watering a green seed in a dream, this It indicates their marriage to a girl with a good religious character. As for the woman who sees in a dream that she is watering the green orchard, this indicates that she will earn a lot of money. A woman who does not have children and who sees herself watering the crops in a dream indicates that she will become pregnant soon. Interpretation of a dream Spraying plants for unmarried women. The interpretation of seeing yourself watering plants in a dream for a single woman is one of the visions that indicates a lot of goodness and livelihood that she will get in one’s life. The interpretation of a dream about watering dry land in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates that soon all her problems and sorrows will end and her desires will be fulfilled. Her successes and seeing the plant growing after watering the land indicates that she has won a lot of money in her life and that she is married to a man who is rich in money, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about watering plants for a married woman. Seeing a married woman alone watering plants is one of the visions that portends a lot of goodness and indicates the abundance of money in her life with her. And her husband, as the husband's condition changes and he gains a lot from his life. Trade and work. Also, seeing a childless woman planting a tree in a dream indicates an imminent pregnancy and also indicates her righteous successor in her life and God’s compensation for her patience. Interpretation of a dream about spraying blue water for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman watering a pig in a dream is one of the visions that indicate... That boys

Interpretation of a dream about spraying plants for a married woman Seeing a married woman alone watering plants is one of the visions that portends a lot of good and indicates an abundance of money in her life with her and her husband, as it shows a change in the husband's condition and his earning a lot from his life. title: Interpretation of a dream about combing hair

preview.html: Learn about the interpretation of a hairstyle in a dream through this article. God Almighty said: “They say failed dreams, but we do not explain dreams with two worlds (44).” Dreams are another world. You see things in your dream that you cannot explain, and sometimes you see something that shows your curiosity to know its interpretation, but not everything we see in our dreams has an explanation, and God Almighty alone knows the unseen, and in this article today in the encyclopedia we present a group of the most important interpretations related to seeing a hairstyle in a dream, follow us. Hair styling in a dream according to Ibn Sirin. If a person sees in a dream that he is combing and combing his hair, and that this hair is long, then this vision expresses that this person will receive from God Almighty a lot of good money and abundance. And in the event that a person sees that he is combing his short hair. This dream expresses that this person will have a lot of knowledge and will reach the highest positions in the shortest period of time. If one sees himself combing his hair with a wooden comb. This vision symbolizes the great fear of envy that characterizes this person. As for the man who sees in his dream that he is giving his wife a wooden comb. This vision is good news that his wife will become pregnant soon. If one sees in a dream that he has won a silver comb. This vision is one of the visions that express that this person will receive abundant money from God Almighty. If the person sees that he is combing his hair with difficulty and that his hair is flying. This vision is one of the visions that express the presence of many problems and difficulties that plague the life of this visionary. And if he sees that he combs his hair easily? This symbolizes that he will reach his goals and ambitions that he has been striving for for a long time. Interpretation of hairstyle for single women: If an unmarried girl dreams that she is combing her hair with a wooden comb. This vision expresses the good moral qualities of this girl and that she is a religious girl. One of the interpretations of this vision is that this girl will meet a young man as soon as possible, and he will marry her. And if the girl sees that she is combing her hair with an iron comb? This vision symbolizes that this girl is suffering from many problems in her life. Seeing combing your hair with an iron comb in a single woman’s dream also indicates that there is an unfaithful person in her life who will create many problems in her life. But if an unmarried girl sees that she is combing her hair Her hair appeared in the dream to a large extent. This vision symbolizes the postponement of an important issue that this girl is trying to achieve for a while. Interpretation of a dream about someone combing my hair for a single woman. Ibn Sirin explained that if an unmarried woman sees in her dream someone combing her hair, and lice comes out of her hair in the dream, then this person is not valid in her life. But if The woman was combing her hair with a wooden comb, and lice also appeared coming out of her hair. This vision with the edge of the comb symbolizes that this person is one of her enemies and not her lover as she thinks. In the event that an unmarried girl sees someone combing her hair, the girl’s long hair will appear in the dream. This vision symbolizes the distant time in which her dreams will come true. This shows that there is room for the girl to work

title: Interpretation of meat in a dream - seeing eating meat in a dream

preview.html: A dream about meat for a single girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, for a divorced woman, whether she cuts and eats beef, chicken meat, or raw cooked poultry meat. She buys it from the butcher, according to Ibn Sirin and others. Interpretation of a dream about meat. The appearance of raw meat in a dream is a sign of the bad circumstances and suffering to which this person is exposed. As for cooked meat, it is evidence. title: Interpretation of a dream about sitting on the carpet in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of sitting on the carpet in a dream. We may want to know the interpretation of the dream of sitting on the carpet in a dream, and it is one of the interpretations that some people want to know the meaning of this dream and whether it indicates good or evil. In fact, the dream and its interpretation are good, and it is the jurisprudence of scholars. Interpretation of the dream of sitting on the carpet Carpet in a dream Sitting on carpets in a dream may mean traveling on Umrah or Hajj for the sake of insight, thanks to God. A person’s dream that he was sitting on a folded carpet may indicate that he is going through a major crisis that will pass for a period of time. In the event that there is a person sitting on the carpet in a dream, he may This indicates happy dreams that may happen to the visionary on those days, thanks to God. Seeing sitting on the carpet in a dream can indicate the end of the financial problems and debts that the dreamer was facing in his life at that time, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about a green carpet in a dream for everyone who sees it. A green carpet in his dream may indicate that he will hear happy news in the coming days, thanks to God. Dreaming of a green carpet in a dream may indicate the marital and family stability that they enjoy during this time, and God knows best. In the case of a person, a green carpet may indicate the end of a crisis Financially, the dreamer of the vision has suffered for a long time. A dream of a green carpet in a man’s dream may indicate that God’s grace will facilitate his affairs and circumstances. Interpretation of a dream about making carpets in a dream: Seeing girls laying a carpet in a dream may indicate the lawful ruling that the dreamer may obtain during this dream. Period, and God knows best. If a person sees making carpets in a dream, this may indicate that he is a person who is approaching God, Blessed and Almighty, and performs many acts of worship. Seeing a person making carpets may indicate that he is a religious, moral person, thanks to God. A dream about years of carpet may indicate In a dream, it indicates great material gains that the dreamer may gain during this period, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about sweeping a carpet in a dream. A person’s dream that he is cleaning carpets can indicate the fulfillment of desires and dreams, thanks to God. In the case of seeing carpet sweeping in a dream, this may indicate a high status. The dreamer may reach it during this period, and God knows best. In the case of a vision of sweeping carpets in a dream, it may indicate the unresolved problems and difficulties that the dreamer faces in his life and during this period, and God knows best. It is possible that seeing carpets in a dream indicates the desire to achieve dreams and aspirations. The person with the vision, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about urinating on the carpet in the house in a dream. Urinating on the carpets in a dream may indicate the actions of the person with bad insight and he must stop them. In the event that he sees urinating on the carpet in a dream inside the house, this may indicate some financial obstacles that the people of The house at that time and they need to seek help from God. Seeing urinating on the carpets of the house in a dream may indicate some wrong things that the dreamer is doing and that he is ashamed of them at that time, and God knows best. title: Interpretation of a dream about wearing shoes by Ibn Sirin 2021

preview.html: The dream of wearing or taking off shoes in a dream is one of the most mysterious dreams for the dreamer, so he is curious to know the interpretation of his vision. Therefore, today we are talking about a different one, which will be approximately the interpretation of a dream about wearing shoes by Ibn Sirin. We will talk about the different interpretations of this dream. The interpretation of a dream about wearing shoes by Ibn Sirin. In the interpretation of a gentleman wearing shoes by Ibn Sirin, this is evidence of the arrival of sustenance and ease in the dreamer’s affairs and the achievement of his goals and desires. The vision of buying new shoes also indicates great goodness. Which the dreamer will get. Seeing the same woman wearing new shoes symbolizes her meeting a person in her life and her great attachment to him, and interpretations vary depending on the shape and color of the shoe. Interpretation of a dream about wearing Ibn Sirin’s shoes for unmarried women. Interpretation of a dream about wearing Ibn Sirin’s shoes for an unmarried woman is that if she sees herself She wears shoes, which means that someone will marry her, but she needs time to think about it. And if she sees that she is buying shoes in her dream, this indicates that her affairs will improve and her situation will be for the better. Seeing her wearing high heels symbolizes her relationship with a person of high standing and status. In society. And when she sees that she is wearing black shoes, it makes it clear that she knows a man, but their relationship does not go beyond their work. If the color of the shoe is white, it means that she knows a man and marriage between them. While seeing a single woman buying blue shoes means that good things will happen in her life and the achievement of her desired goals. If she wears tight shoes in her dream, this indicates her stubbornness and obstinacy. But if the shoe is wide, this explains her lack of good appreciation for the things she encounters in her life. If an unmarried woman sees herself cleaning her shoes in a dream, this is interpreted as her preparation for an important visit or her desire to get married and her wedding dress. Seeing a single woman wearing heels High also indicates her success in life and the fulfillment of her ambitions and dreams. And if he sees himself untangling the laces that he wears in a dream, this symbolizes that he is currently going through a big problem, but this problem will be resolved and this crisis will end soon. Interpretation of a dream about wearing Ibn Sirin’s shoes for a married womanWhen a woman sees A married woman in her dream that her husband offers her new shoes, this means in Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of wearing shoes that this dreamer will give birth soon, God willing, and this is also evidence of their happiness. A happy relationship brings them together. But seeing a married woman wearing new shoes in her dream means that she does not want to consummate her marriage and that she wants a divorce and that she will marry again after her divorce. And if a married woman sees old shoes in her dream, this symbolizes the entry of some people she already knows, but Their return to her life again will cause her disagreements and problems. Read also: Interpretation of a dream about wearing clothes that do not cover the dream for senior imams Interpretation of a dream about wearing Ibn Sirin’s shoes for a pregnant woman Seeing a pregnant woman wearing shoes in her dream has many interpretations in Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of wearing shoes. If the visionary wears a

title: Interpretation of a dream about a dead person giving cooked meat

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a dead person giving cooked meat in a dream to one girl: Seeing a deceased person in a dream giving cooked meat to an unmarried woman, but his features appear sad. The vision indicates that the dreamer will fall into a problem or a misfortune for her relative that will make her sad, but she will get rid of it soon, God willing. And if she sees an unmarried girl Married to a dead person she knows, she takes him a piece of cooked meat that tastes delicious in a dream. It indicates gaining a prestigious position or being promoted to a high position in her current job. The interpretation of this vision may also indicate the advancement of a wealthy person suitable for her. Or if the unmarried woman sees in a dream One of her deceased relatives gives her a piece of cooked meat. This indicates that he received an inheritance from this person, and God knows best. If an unmarried woman agrees to take cooked meat from the dead person, but it is spoiled or has a strange taste. This vision is a warning to her against accepting unauthorized money, Which she has no right to take. You must return them to their owners, and God knows best. If an unmarried girl sees in a dream a dead person giving her fresh meat and she is late for marriage. This is good news that she will marry a suitable man who is known in the world for his good morals and conduct. Likewise, if an unmarried girl sees a dead person He eats cooked meat in a dream, then this dead person is also known to her. The vision shows the high status of this person and the goodness of the afterlife. See also: Interpretation of a dream about a dead person asking for food. Interpretation of dreams to see a dead person offering cooked meat in a dream to a married woman. If a married woman sees a dead person in her dream, she will She offers him cooked meat. This indicates a lot of goodness that will come to her in the coming period from where she does not know, and God knows best. Or if a married woman sees in a dream a dead man whom she knows in reality, and she offers her a large piece of meat and cooks it. The vision shows that he is living a life A stable and happy marriage. When a married woman sees a dead person in a dream, she gives her a piece of cooked meat, but it is rotten and rotten, and insects have spread in it. The vision shows that he is suffering from many problems and obstacles. Or, on the contrary, if a dead man gives her a piece of cooked meat in a married woman’s dream. Fresh cooked meat. This vision indicates the beginning of a new and better life away from problems and quarrels between her and her husband. A dream about a deceased person giving cooked meat to a married woman may predict that she will become pregnant soon, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing a dead man giving a man cooked meat in a dream and its meaning if the man is married to a dead person. In a dream, he receives cooked meat with a pleasant taste and smell. This is a sign of good and abundant livelihood that God will give him soon. It may be good for him to hear the news of his wife’s pregnancy. Either he sees a dead man giving him cooked meat, and he took it from him, smiling, and the dreamer was in reality sick. This is good news. For his recovery soon, and God knows best. And if the fortuneteller is an immigrant abroad, and he sees in his dream a dead person whom he knows, he will give him cooked meat. This is a sign that he will return home again and see his family soon, God willing. Seeing in a dream a man who needs to eat meat

Interpretation of seeing a dead man giving a man cooked meat in a dream and its meaning if the man is married to a dead person. In a dream, he receives cooked meat with a pleasant taste and smell. This is a sign of good and abundant livelihood that God will give him soon. It may be good for him to hear the news of his wife’s pregnancy. Either he sees a dead man giving him cooked meat, and he took it from him, smiling, and the dreamer was in reality sick. This is good news. For his recovery soon, and God knows best. And if the fortuneteller is an immigrant abroad, and he sees in his dream a dead person whom he knows, he will give him cooked meat. This is a sign that he will return home again and see his family soon, God willing. Seeing in a dream a man who needs to eat meat
